About Me

A jack of all trades with a thirst for knowledge.

I'm a husband, father of two, an outdoor adventurer, a craftsman, a gamer and a teacher. My education has come from real world experience, and I'm constantly looking for new and exciting things to learn. I'm psyched about software development because it's like having a cheat code to the modern world!

My story

I was born and raised in Bristol, Virginia, and learned to love nature and adventure at a young age. Through backpacking, climbing, mountain biking and whitewater rafting I've constantly challenged myself while finding an inner peace that I can't find any other way.

I've taken a few breaks from traversing the backcountry to start the first Parkour Website in the US, American Parkour, and the first Parkour gym in the world, Primal Fitness. I've trained special forces athletes, welded and fabricated grounds maintenance equipment climbed trees with chainsaws, and taught high school kids outdoor skills. Now, I'm continuing this constant movement as I dive into web development in hopes of finding a job that values work-life balance and will allow me to travel throughout the Western US!

About This Website

This site is first and foremost a place for me to apply the things I'm learning as a self taught developer. From time to time links will be broken or styling will be a bit funky, but it's a constant work in progress. I started this out as a Bootstrap template because I felt like I needed to bite the bullet and improve my knowledge of CSS frameworks. Once I've got the basic static version 100% functional I will be rebuilding this all in React! If any other new tech sounds fun or extra-functional I'll be applying it here as well (I'm lookinga at you, Sanity, Svelte and Gatsby ;).
